Class slopeThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • datascilib.Regression.LinearRegression.regression.slopeThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Double[]>

    public class slopeThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Double[]>

    slopeThread

    Calculates the slope using LMS of a partition of datasets x and y
    Since:
    2019-04-20

      (package private) java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch> countDownLatch
